title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that makes it easy to run Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally on macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, providing a simple interface to interact with local and remote Ollama models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, enabling browser and Node.js integration with local LLMs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing use of local Ollama models within LangChain chains and agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat interface, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs to interact with Ollama models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust client for Ollama with async support and ergonomic APIs for chatting and generating embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an AI coding assistant.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models directly in Discord channels.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support and persistent storage.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React, offering a native app experience.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, enabling retrieval-augmented generation pipelines with local models.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app that exposes Ollama models via REST endpoints with authentication, rate limiting, and admin UI.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface for Ollama with session memory, model switching, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with context support and idiomatic Go APIs for chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to interact with Ollama servers.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Python developers to integrate Ollama models into applications.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ with async enumerables and System.Text.Json serialization.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings local AI assistance into note-taking with custom prompts and template variables.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama supporting threaded conversations, app mentions, and model per channel.
